thread.title: Smartfren Telekom and Celltick Partner to Provide a Custom Start Screen to Android users in Indonesia
thread.title_full: Smartfren Telekom and Celltick Partner to Provide a Custom Start Screen to Android users in Indonesia - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Smartfren Telekom and Celltick Partner to Provide a Custom Start Screen to Android users in Indonesia
text:
Smartfren consumers to get Start based interface on Android devices
San Francisco, Calif. (PRWEB) September 25, 2015
Celltick, a global leader in mobile marketing, today announced its partnership with Smartfren Telekom (Smartfren), a leading telecommunications company in Indonesia, to launch an intelligent start screen for Android subscribers. With this partnership, Smartfren will provide its 12 million subscribers fast access to their favorite and most frequently used applications and functions, including special offers through a customized version of Celltick’s Start that will be preloaded on Smartfren Android devices. Smartfren existing users will be able to download promotions via SMS broadcast, Smartfren website or “Mysmartfren” application .
Start provides users with an intelligent next-generation start screen giving users what they want most when they wake up their phone. Smartfren users will get a quick view into the most relevant news, personal social media feeds, weather, web search and more. With the latest version of Start, users would also be able to personalize their start screen with stickers and play interactive games utilizing the innovative lockgames technology. Start utilizes a recommendation engine that uses big data techniques and collaborative filtering methodologies to adapt the start screen to users based on how they use their device.
Smartfren users will get a high value interface that makes their Android phone unique and personalized. Users will also be able to get a truly smart Android device with the Smartfren smartphone. With Start, Smartfren will engage effectively with their subscribers, making them aware of the latest services and products offered to them and also to provide targeted offers.
“We are committed to providing technologies that add value to the mobile lifestyle of our subscribers, while making it easy for them to use it. Celltick Start allows us to lead the way in providing the best of breed mobile experience on the best of breed network available in Indonesia. We continue to show our commitment to providing high value to our subscribers with this partnership” said Mr. Hermansyah, Head of Service of Smartfren. “By working with Celltick, we will provide localized and targeted services that build loyalty and deliver value to our millions of subscribers.”
‘We are extremely happy to be working with Smartfren. We continue to focus on developing an intelligent, engaging start screen that users love and value” said Ronen Daniel, CEO of Celltick. “Adoption of Start by Smartfren is further proof to the market leadership position of our value proposition and the joint vision of both companies to provide high quality services to Android users. We are fully committed to ensuring success of this partnership.”
The growing Start ecosystem includes hundreds of themes, plug-ins, stickers and lockgames. Start has been adopted by large operators, OEMs and media companies who distribute over 100M devices around the globe. In 2014, Celltick powered billions of mobile-initiated commerce transactions for virtual and physical goods serving more than 150 million active consumers across 25 countries.
About Smartfren
Smartfren Telecom is the first telecom service provider in the world who provide mobile services with EV- DO technology in Indonesia, with the largest number of subscribers reached more than 12 million . By now , Smartfren is been using the latest technology EV-DO Rev.B to serve customers scattered throughout Indonesia, from the island of Sumatra, Java, Kalimantan and Sulawesi. Smartfren held more than 6000 base stations in all regions. As part of its commitment to development of the mobile telecommunications industry in Indonesia , Smartfren has implemented gradually CDMA 1X technology , CDMA EVDO , CDMA Rev B and is now heading towards the start of the 4G LTE service .
Smartfren always seek convenience and satisfaction for customers in communicating with devices that have the support of the latest specifications at affordable prices. That's why Smartfren presenting flagship smartphone product line with brand Andromax to its customers. In terms of mobile services, Smartfren offers a variety of packet data services and content that appeals to customers. All product and service data, Smartfren offer price competitive and affordable.
Customer satisfaction is paramount to Smartfren. In regard to fulfill the needs of customers, Smartfren now supported by 24 hours call center where the customers can contact 888 and 95 galleries Smartfren, coupled with 101 Smile Gallery . As the evidence of advanced services we have given to our subscribers, we have received several awards, ranging from service excellent, product award to the best CDMA operator in 2014.
About Celltick
Celltick is a global leader in mobile initiated commerce. Celltick’s Start is a next generation personalized intelligent interface for Android devices. Celltick is unique in creating and managing mass market mobile marketing solutions for mobile operators, large media companies, device manufacturers and large brands. Celltick enables its partners to engage and monetize their users on the mobile. The company drives billions of transactions annually across more than 150 million active consumers across its different mobile platforms in over 25 countries. A rapidly growing company, Celltick has subsidiaries in Europe, Asia, South America and the U.S. For more information, visit http://www.celltick.com .
